extension.name: Remoteform (Joinery fork)
extension.description: Remoteform allows you to easily create CiviCRM forms on a remote web site using a few lines of javascript code.
extension.comments: This module is not fully tested and not ready for production. If using with Stripe, please ensure you are running Stripe greater or equal to 6.3. Joinery's additions in support of recurring contributions are not yet compatible with Stripe.
